item.title: Hack the Box "Behind the Scenes" Writeup, or How to Skip Illegal Instructions in Executables
item.description: In this post, we’re going to dissect a very simple challenge from Hack the Box, “Behind the Scenes”. We’ll also look at how to work with Unix signals and how to skip illegal instructions in executables. Buckle up!
